Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
bto.model.UserPerson
bto.model.Applicant
public class Applicant extends bto.model.UserPerson
Applicant class that inherits from UserPerson class Applicant is a subclass of UserPerson, inheriting attributes and methods from the superclass Attributes inherited: name, NRIC, age, marital status, password and user type

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEnquiry(bto.model.Enquiry e)
     
    boolean
    applyForProject(bto.model.Project project, String flatType)
    Applicant applying for project that will be done by the Officer Checks whether Applicant has an existing application, returns false if exists Checks whether Applicant is a current Officer for the project, returns false is they are an Officer Checks eligibility of Applicant, if not eligible, return false Successful creation of application will return true and change application status to "Pending"
    void
    bookFlat(String flatType)
    Books flat type depending on the type of flat Done by the Officer Application status will be set to "Booked" upon successful booking and return

    isWithdrawn()

    void
    setApplicationStatus(String status)
    Setter function to set application status
    void
    setAppliedProjectId(int appliedProjectId)
     
    void
    setWithdrawn(boolean withdrawn)
     
    void
    viewEnquiriesAll()
     
    void
    viewOwnStatus()
    Prints project details of applicant, project ID, status, booked flat type and withdrawal status Application Status set to "None" by default, once an application is made, it will become "Pending" Upon Manager's approval it will show "Successful" and upon Officer booking flat, it will turn to "Booked" Manager's refusal will result in "Unsuccessful" Applicant wishing to withdraw from the project will show "Pending Withdrawal" and having the Manager's approval will show "Withdrawn"
    boolean
    withdrawApplication()
    Applicant wishes to withdraw from the project Gets BTO application of Applicant by checking against NRIC Updates status of application to "Pending Withdrawal" returns true when withdrawal has been requested

    Methods inherited from class bto.model.UserPerson

    changePassword, getAge, getMaritalStatus, getName, getNRIC, getPassword, getUserType, LoadUsers, readUsersFromFile, setUserType, writeBackToCSV

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String name, String NRIC, int age, String maritalStatus, String password)

  • Method Details

    • viewOwnStatus

      public void viewOwnStatus()
      Prints project details of applicant, project ID, status, booked flat type and withdrawal status Application Status set to "None" by default, once an application is made, it will become "Pending" Upon Manager's approval it will show "Successful" and upon Officer booking flat, it will turn to "Booked" Manager's refusal will result in "Unsuccessful" Applicant wishing to withdraw from the project will show "Pending Withdrawal" and having the Manager's approval will show "Withdrawn"
      Overrides:
      viewOwnStatus in class bto.model.UserPerson

    • isEligible

      public boolean isEligible(bto.model.Project project, String flatType)
      Checks eligibility of the person for the flat type, depending on their marital status Returns true if person is eligible and false otherwise
      Parameters:
      project - BTO project
      flatType - flat type to be checked
      Returns:
      returns true or false

    • applyForProject

      public boolean applyForProject(bto.model.Project project, String flatType)
      Applicant applying for project that will be done by the Officer Checks whether Applicant has an existing application, returns false if exists Checks whether Applicant is a current Officer for the project, returns false is they are an Officer Checks eligibility of Applicant, if not eligible, return false Successful creation of application will return true and change application status to "Pending"
      Parameters:
      project - BTO project
      flatType - flat type to apply for
      Returns:
      returns true or false

    • withdrawApplication

      public boolean withdrawApplication()
      Applicant wishes to withdraw from the project Gets BTO application of Applicant by checking against NRIC Updates status of application to "Pending Withdrawal" returns true when withdrawal has been requested
      Returns:
      returns true or false

      public void setApplicationStatus(String status)
      Setter function to set application status

      public String getApplicationStatus()
      Getter function to get application status
      Returns:
      returns current application status

    • bookFlat

      public void bookFlat(String flatType)
      Books flat type depending on the type of flat Done by the Officer Application status will be set to "Booked" upon successful booking and return
      Parameters:
      flatType - flat type to be booked

    • getFlatTypeBooked

      public String getFlatTypeBooked()
      Getter function to get booked flat type
      Returns:
      returns type of flat booked

    • hasApplied

      public boolean hasApplied()
      Checks whether application has applied to and not withdrawn from project
      Returns:
      returns true if applied

    • isWithdrawn

      public boolean isWithdrawn()
      Checks if Applicant is withdrawn returns true if Applicant withdrew and false otherwise
      Returns:
      returns true or false
